admin-egoi.navigation.label: E-goi
admin/egoi-admin.syncFieldsText: Choose the fields from your contact list in E-goi that will receive the contacts created in Vtex.
admin/egoi-admin.syncDefaultFieldsText: The Name, Surname, Email and Mobile fields are already mapped and will be synchronized with your list.
admin/egoi-admin.csText1: Connected Sites is an E-goi content manager feature, connected to your Vtex Store, perfect for remarketing actions like returning users, abandoned cart, forms and much more!
admin/egoi-admin.csText2: Activate this option here, and confirm if Connected Sites is also active in E-goi Platform (Account Settings -> Connected Sites).
admin/egoi-admin.csText3: To know more about the feature Connected Sites, check
admin/egoi-admin.csErrorStore: Error saving settings! There are no Store configuration!
admin/egoi-admin.apiKeyText: To activate the integration you need to choose the list where you want to sync and save the data.
admin/egoi-admin.legacy1: Attention! If you have activated the
admin/egoi-admin.legacy3: with vtex, this integration will replace the existing one.
admin/egoi-admin.configNeed: Need to configure integration in Account tab!
